actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to capital asset defined.

summary.text: Includes within the definition of capital asset, under the Internal Revenue Code, a tape recording or other method of reproduction or preservation of conversations or matters which may be set down in a letter or memorandum.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to capital asset defined.
